A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
You can spray perfume on dogshit and it'll still stink.

The same goes for this movie. As much as Disney and critics want to shove this crap down our throats\, the story of this movie makes it impossible. If anything\, the critics and Disney are losing their credibility. 

Just simple an awful movie period. I'll boycott Star Wars and anything being offered by Disney.

Remember\, we are the ones spending the money\, and best thing to do is not give it to them.
